text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Well, we've danced at the disco, had<n>Italian food, and
looked around some<n>luxury brand stores! There's one last<n>
thing to do before we go...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: And that's to enjoy the beach!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
The weather's so nice! Being<n>somewhere so spacious just
makes<n>me want to run!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh? In that case...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Tag! You're it!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?! What?!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Hahaha! Run awaaay!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I'm not going to let you catch me so<n>easily!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?! All right! I'll catch up to you all,<n>you'll see!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Seeeven, eiiight, niiine, ten! Huuup!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Aaaaah! Ahaha!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna get you!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahhh!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I-I'm gonna get you! Huff, puff!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huff! Huff! How are they all sogood at running away?! Change ofplans! Time to narrow my focus downto one person!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eenie, meenie, miney, mo... There!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Scarlet! Don't think you can outrun<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Nooo!

text_block_list.name: Spe and Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huff... Puff!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Give it up and let me catch you<n>already, Scarlet!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: No way! I'm terrible at being it!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hehehe! If you won't give up, I'll<n>just have to try harder!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Eeeek! Ahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You're not getting away from me!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Wow, they're incredible! You can<n>barely even see them
anymore!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Hey! Just how far are you going to<n>ruuun?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehehe! They're both running great,<n>aren't they?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(The sand is so hot and the wind is<n>cool on my face... This is
so fun! I feel<n>like I can go anywhere I want right<n>now!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (I don't know why, but this feels so<n>familiar...)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(That's right. This is what it feels like<n>to run! It's just about
kicking off each<n>step without thought, cutting through<n>the
wind...)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (And simply moving forward!)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff! Hehe!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I've got you now!

text_block_list.name: Spe and Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huff... Puff... Pant... Pant...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Oof, I don't even have the strength<n>left to be it now. I'm
exhausted. You<n>were chasing after me like your life<n>
depended on it!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's only because you wererunning away as if your life dependedon it! Ahaha!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Hehehe. Aaah! That was fun.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
My legs felt lighter than usual. It's<n>been a while since I got
so completely<n>lost in my running.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Yeah. Same here.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Bubblyland has been amazing. It<n>really did end up reminding
me how to<n>move again.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Running's just as fun as I remember.<n>Hehehe.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I'll have to thank Maruzen. And my<n>mom too.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'll have to apologize to my mom as<n>well!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Did you do something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Well... She kept telling me to go out<n>and have fun, but I kept
ignoring her<n>advice... In the end though, she was<n>right.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I wonder how she knew exactly what<n>I needed?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah. It's strange, huh?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Heeey! Are you guys okay?!

text_block_list.name: Spe and Scarlet
text_block_list.text: We're fiiine!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
We've come quite far. We'd better<n>hurry back. And while
we're at it...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Tag! You're it!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hey! That's no fair!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: That night...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Ring, ring, ring!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: H-hello? Mom?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Hey, Mama? You know, today I...
